coreAttributes.name: nogasm cage
coreAttributes.description: A chastity cage, complete with lock, that's designed to imprison the wearer's cock. Not only it will physically prevent an erection from occurring, its rare and powerful enchantments can keep the wearer oh so close to orgasming but unable to reach that peak during regular sex.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(lock)] the frustration cage in place around [npc.her] cock.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(lock)] the frustration cage in place around [npc2.namePos] cock.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly squeezes [npc2.namePos] cock before locking it inside the frustration cage.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unlock)] and [npc.verb(remove)] the frustration cage that was imprisoning [npc.her] cock.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unlock)] and [npc.verb(remove)] the frustration cage that was imprisoning [npc2.namePos] cock.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] impatiently [npc.verb(unlock)] and [npc.verb(pull)] off the frustration cage that was imprisoning [npc2.namePos] cock.
